attributes.additional_details: Have controls in place for dog walkers regarding certifications they should possess, number of dogs they can walk, mandatory disclosure, mandatory pet first aid training, must have public liability insurance in place and paperwork.
attributes.background: Have a regulatory body put in place, for all within the industry to conform to.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/725128

Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for where you live. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.  
 
The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:  

https://www.parliament.scot/chamber-and-committees/committees/current-and-previous-committees/session-6-citizen-participation-and-public-petitions-committee
